moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4: not mutch fan of crowded games
moves.3... exd4 4. Nxd4 Be7 5. Bc4 Nf6 6. Nc3: developing the elite army with knights and bishops
moves.7... b5: first attack ! bringing his light bishop on b7 will take control of full diagonal and will put pressure on my king side where i wanna castle.
moves.8. Bd5: moving my light bishop on d5 will more likely force him to take with his knight !
moves.9. Nxd5 O-O 10. Qf3 Be6 11. e5:
this is the key move which happend to be a winning one this time.
opens diagonal for the queen an threatening an discovered attack on his rock !
moves.12. Nxe6: now my evil plan shall begin! .. pining the queen and the rock ~ he will more likely take the knight with his pawn
moves.12... fxe6: which also carried to an discovered attack on my queen !!
moves.13. Nxe7+: captures his bishop with check so he must capture back or move his king ...
moves.13... Qxe7 14. Qxa8: and the cherry on cake is mine :D
moves.14... Qb4+: I chose to lose my two pawns on b2&c2 but to know my king safe !!
moves.15. c3 Qxb2 16. O-O Qxc3 17. Rac1 Qa5 18: another bait :) this time did'n bite, if Qxa3 then my bishop bc5 will pin his queen and his rock
moves.18... c6 19. Qb7 Re8 20. Ba7: forcing the end game as long i'm in advantage
moves.23... a5 24. Rxe6: an fin, black resign as my hungry rock is still doing damage !!

gameName: an pawn sacrifice win the game
